class.desc: An enum for type codes for language errors.
class.body:
A comment was unterminated.
The string had a bad escape.
The string was unterminated.
<constant name="ERROR_XML_REFERENCE_BAD type="int32" visbility="public">
There was an invalid xml reference.
<constant name="ERROR_XML_COMMENT_UNTERMINATED type="int32" visbility="public">
The xml comment was unterminated.
<constant name="ERROR_XML_CDATA_UNTERMINATED type="int32" visbility="public">
The xml CDATA was unterminated.
<constant name="ERROR_BAD_SPAN type="int32" visbility="public">
There was a bad span of characters in the context.
